name: ENCHANTMENT
description:
‘A feeling of great liking for something wonderful and unusual.’ - Welcome to the ENCHANTMENT issue. 
What do you find enchanting? Is it hallucinating, magical, a dream world, fairy tale or your place of calm or escape? prototype magazine has explored your creative interpretations of enchantment throughout this issue. 
We meet talented photographer Katie Eleanor who features on the cover – an enchanting being and she has us charmed. The beautiful voice of Emily Lawson made our ears prick up, and our mouths twitch into a smile; we fell head over heels for Erin Case’s mixed media collages and Maria Montiel shares her fondest memories of the place she finds most enchanting. 
prototype magazine hopes that this issue will take you on an enchanting journey, challenge your current feelings of enchantment and add some mystery into your creativity. Should you wish to create an piece of artwork inspired by this issue, you can send it to submit [!at] prototype-mag.co.uk and we may publish it on our blog. 
So, to begin this issue with a Once Upon A Time…

name: TRANSFORMATION
description: This beautifully made edition of prototype magazine explores the idea of transformation through inspiring artwork and thoughtful words. With a striking cover this one stands out from the rest and really makes you think about where you’re going and encourages you to make that important change. Whether transformation to you means a potato transformer, or whether it’s playing dress up as an Egyptian, we've got light hearted notes with added dreamy photography to make you tick.

name: LAUNCH
description: Over the Spring months we have been working hard to bring you issue three. This is marks the launch of prototype magazine and we hope you like all it has to offer. 2012 bought prototype magazine so many exciting things already and we have plenty more in the pipeline. For issue three we chose the perfect mixture of eclectic and quaint artists, photographers and designers. It is my pleasure to launch prototype magazine officially into the industry and with that I hope it brings all of our readers much enjoyment, and our contributors much success.
